description: Ovzon AB engages in the provision of mobile broadband services through satellite. The company is headquartered in Solna, Stockholm and currently employs 33 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2018-05-18. The firm offers services via satellite combining bandwidth satellite communication services with mobile terminals. Terminals are offered in two versions: Manpacks, which enable transmit throughput of 20 megabits per second (Mbps) and received reception of 60 Mbps, as well as On The Move (OTM) terminal that transmits data rates of 8 Mbps using 6 inches antennas (13 Mbps with 9 inches). The Company’s services and technologies are applicable for providing secure broadband satellite communication in remote and dynamic coverage areas, for high-resolution live broadcasts and for secure, broadband communication for drones. Ovzon AB (publ) reports segment’s division that is based on the customer types and is divided into: Government, Media, NGO and Others. The firm operates in Sweden and the United States.
naicsNationalIndustry: Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing
name: Ovzon AB (publ)
